timeline.bodyText: You'll need to remove System.getEnv here.
timeline.author: g2vinay

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/batch/microsoft-azure-batch/src/test/java/com/microsoft/azure/batch/BatchIntegrationTestBase.java b/sdk/batch/microsoft-azure-batch/src/test/java/com/microsoft/azure/batch/BatchIntegrationTestBase.java
index c2511d1ba2d..ebe1cb31d8f 100644
--- a/sdk/batch/microsoft-azure-batch/src/test/java/com/microsoft/azure/batch/BatchIntegrationTestBase.java
+++ b/sdk/batch/microsoft-azure-batch/src/test/java/com/microsoft/azure/batch/BatchIntegrationTestBase.java

@@ -359,7 +359,7 @@ public class BatchIntegrationTestBase {
         }
         String vNetResourceId = String.format(
             "/subscriptions/%s/resourceGroups/%s/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/%s/subnets/%s",
-            System.getenv("677f962b-9abf-4423-a27b-0c2f4094dcec"),
+            "677f962b-9abf-4423-a27b-0c2f4094dcec",
             "sdktest2",
             vnetName,
             subnetName);

timeline.message: Bundling in quick CHANGELOG update requested by SDK team
